headline: T Expands Into Satellite Connectivity Space: Will it Boost Prospects?
summary: AT&T teams up with AST SpaceMobile to bring satellite connectivity to rural and remote areas, launching gateways and a 2026 beta for customers and FirstNet.

raw.headline: T Expands Into Satellite Connectivity Space: Will it Boost Prospects?
raw.summary: AT&T teams up with AST SpaceMobile to bring satellite connectivity to rural and remote areas, launching gateways and a 2026 beta for customers and FirstNet.

headline: AmpliTech Group Achieves 100% Open RAN Handover Validation at POWDER OTIC PlugFest Featuring AT&T, DISH Wireless, Samsung, VMware, and Other Leading Global Participants
summary: The Significant 100% Success Demonstrates AmpliTech's Carrier-Grade Reliability for Open RAN NetworksHAUPPAUGE, N.Y., Dec. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- AmpliTech Group (NASDAQ: AMPG), today announced a major milestone in the commercialization of Open RAN technology. During the O-RAN Global PlugFest Fall 2025, AmpliTech’s Radio Units (O-RUs) achieved a 100% successful handover validation rate across multi-vendor environments. What's a handover? When you're on a phone call in your car driving down
